alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 8:30PM CDT until October 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Sheridan County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 800 PM MDT. * At 730 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles south of Gordon, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gordon, Billys Lake, Lone Butte, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Rock Hill, Bayonne, and Intersection of Highway 27 and Mills Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 104 and 118. Highway 250 between mile markers 26 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
